title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Southampton + Arsenal + São Paulo FC Saturday + SundayFootball Prediction Contest!Game 1: Southampton v Liverpool   (Saturday)Game 2:  Arsenal v Wolves  (Saturday)Game 3: São Paulo FC v Goiás  (Sunday)Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  15'  2-1  Southampton Game 2:  15'  3-0  ArsenalGame 3:  15'  1-0  São Paulo FCPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free Bet If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mbtc

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Along with the weekly Yellow Cap (2 mbtc Free Bet), there will also be similar Exclusive Promos for everyone who signs up for hilarious' World Cup Prediction pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419161.0
